"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5407ea2463687255ffe80100#post_5407ea2463687255ffe80100
[bq="mariomarc"]"@gasmaskangel":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5407e9c86368725897d10100#post_5407e9c86368725897d10100
god that music is actually just so cheesy

any actual suggestions for romantic/love-making music[/bq]

This got me thinking, which song gets you guys in the mood?

Personally, there's something about Shiver My Timbers from Muppets Treasure Island that gets to me.

topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5407eb7d63687209f5ce0100#post_5407eb7d63687209f5ce0100
The key is to find something that makes both parties relaxed and comfortable, which is why R&B love ballads are an ever popular choice, though the sexy, sexy voices also help in that case.

Really the only thing to watch out for is someone who wants to fuck to death metal, because they'll either be a lousy lay or insane.
